definition: horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Appendicitis can cause serious complications, such as
sentences.chinese: 闌尾炎可能引起嚴重的併發症。

sentences.english: Methods The data of39cases with appendiceal mass was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回首分析我院闌尾炎性腫塊39例。

sentences.english: If the pain is severe and concentrated on the lower right side of their abdomen, it could be appendicitis.
sentences.chinese: 要是疼得厲害並且集中在腹部右下方，可能是闌尾炎。

sentences.english: And some living animals have a cecum and an appendix.
sentences.chinese: 有些活着的動物既有盲腸又有闌尾。

sentences.english: Have after appendicitis operation bilge abdomen phenomenon what reason is this excuse me?
sentences.chinese: 闌尾炎手術後有脹肚現象請問這是什麼原因？

sentences.english: She has left, for instance, some troublesome bits of scaffolding, like the vermiform appendix, behind.
sentences.chinese: 比如，它遺留下了令人煩惱的殘留物，如隱藏的闌尾。

sentences.english: Methods The data of 48 cases with appendiceal mass was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧分析我院闌尾炎性腫塊48例。

sentences.english: If it is me, I will never cut appendectomy children.
sentences.chinese: 如果是我，我決不給孩子割闌尾。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical value of small incision at Mc Burney point for appendectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討麥氏小切口闌尾切除術的臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: The Analysis of Failing (4. Cases) to Diagnose, Misdiagnose and Therapeutic Error of Acute Appendicitis.
sentences.chinese: 急性闌尾炎漏診，誤診，誤治4例分析。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the application of Murph incision in appendectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討墨菲切口顯露下闌尾切除的優越性。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the characteristics of ultrasound of acute appendicitis diverticulitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性闌尾憩室炎的聲像圖特點。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the management of appendiceal mass in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒闌尾膿腫的治療。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the cause of reoperation after appendectomy and preventive measures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討闌尾切除後再手術的原因及預防措施。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the diagnostic and treatment methods of appendiceal mucoceles and peritoneal pseudomyxoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討闌尾粘液囊腫和腹膜假性粘液瘤的診治方法。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
